snippet: The man the authorities say masterminded a scheme that fleeced the Los Angeles suburb of Bell out of millions of dollars was sentenced to 33 months in prison for income tax evasion.
abstract: Federal Judge George H King sentences Robert Rizzo, former city manager of Bell, Calif, to 33 months in prison for income tax evasion; authorities say Rizzo masterminded a scheme that fleeced the small Los Angeles suburb out of millions of dollars.
lead_paragraph: The man the authorities say masterminded a scheme that fleeced the Los Angeles suburb of Bell out of millions of dollars was sentenced to 33 months in prison for income tax evasion.

headline.main: California: Ex-City Manager Sentenced to 33 Months in First of Two Cases
headline.print_headline: California: Ex-City Manager Sentenced to 33 Months in First of Two Cases
